title: How to sell textbooks on eBay - Quora

response.answer_text: You need the ISBN #, which is usually in the front of the book, sometimes on the back cover, and the copyright/publication date, also on the title page or the next page. You need a picture of the cover. And you need an honest assessment of the book’s condition, things like whether there are markings on the pages, creased pages, yellowing, any stains. Also, consider selling on Amazon, which is where most people will turn to first when searching for a specific book.

Join eBay having a checking and PayPal accounts. On eBay, search textbooks. Notice how other books are being sold. Search your titles Weigh each book to estimate postage, And figure out Put as much infornation in the title line as possible to make search for your books easier.
